action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a collection of colorful, pixelated shapes. There are two red rectangles, one on the top left and one on the bottom left. In the top right corner, there is a purple rectangle. Below the purple rectangle, there is a yellow rectangle with a cross shape inside it. To the right of the yellow rectangle, there is a purple rectangle with a cross shape inside it. The image has a retro, pixel art style.
